segments.advisor_message: Okay, so, let me just sum up what we talked about, uh, your income sources. You mentioned you get, um, a monthly payment, that's, like, your salary, right?
segments.client_message: Yeah, that's right, I get like, uh, two thousand uh, every month, like, net after taxes.

segments.advisor_message: And you also said, um, there's a rental income you receive, right? Can you remind me how much that is?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah! I get, um, around twelve hundred a month from that, uh, gross, before any taxes.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! So, to recap, you have your salary at two thousand net each month, and, um, rental income of twelve hundred gross each month. Is there, uh, anything else you want me to, like, note here?
segments.client_message: Yeah, uh, I just want to say the, the rental income, it should keep going, like, until 2030... maybe more, but, uh, yeah, just till then for sure.
